data.actual_result: The cursor shows up without any Paste option. A possible workaround to paste text is to input random text in the textfield and then long-press to highlight the text
data.expected_result: The "Paste" option should appear so I can paste my backup code
data.short_description: [Likely Android 7.0 and above] Cannot paste text into the backup code textfield
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have 2FA enabled - Logout of Discord - Enter you login/password - At the 2FA screen, tap tje 3 dots and open the backup code input modal - Long press on the textfield. Make sure you have your backup code in the clipboard!
